name: Zombie Game (Optical Raze)
description:
Information

I made this game during the holidays, it is a simple zombie shooter game with a little holiday spirit and some mediocre pixel art.

Controls

Keyboard

  • Arrow keys / WASD : Move
  • Left mouse button : Shoot
Screenshots Credits
  • Design, programming, art and audio by Optical Raze
  • Sounds by ZapSplat & Mattias "Mattix" Lahoud
  • Soundtrack by BoxCat Games
